00033   void BifWriteEngine::registerParameters()
00034   {
00035     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("BifWriteEngine_prefix",
00036                                                    "BifWriteEngine prefix to tree variables",
00037                                                    _prefix,
00038                                                    std::string("Bif"));
00039 
00040     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterInputCollection(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,_engineName+"_InCol",
00041                                                 "Name of input collection",
00042                                                 _bifColName, std::string("BIFData")  );
00043   }
00044

00051 
00052   void BifWriteEngine::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00053   {
00054     if ( _prefix.size() > 0 )
00055       if ( _prefix[ _prefix.length()-1 ] != '_' )
00056         _prefix += "_";
00057 
00058     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"StartAcq").c_str(),     &_bifFill.StartAcq, 
00059                      string(_prefix+"StartAcq/L").c_str());
00060     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"StopAcq").c_str(),     &_bifFill.StopAcq, 
00061                      string(_prefix+"StopAcq/L").c_str());
00062     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"nTrigger").c_str(),     &_bifFill.nTrigger, 
00063                      string(_prefix+"nTrigger/I").c_str());
00064     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"source").c_str(),     &_bifFill.source, 
00065                      string(_prefix+"source["+_prefix+"nTrigger]/I").c_str());
00066     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"BXID").c_str(),     &_bifFill.BXID, 
00067                      string(_prefix+"BXID["+_prefix+"nTrigger]/I").c_str());
00068     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"Time").c_str(),     &_bifFill.Time, 
00069                      string(_prefix+"Time["+_prefix+"nTrigger]/F").c_str());
00070 
00071   }
00072

00074   /*                                                                               */
00075   /*                                                                               */
00076   /*                                                                               */
00077   /*********************************************************************************/
00078   void BifWriteEngine::fillVariables( EVENT::LCEvent* evt ) 
00079   {
00080     LCCollection* inCol;
00081     
00082     try {
00083       inCol = evt->getCollection( _bifColName );
00084 
00085       streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<"\n Event "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<", loop over collection "<<_bifColName
00086                            <<" with "<<inCol->getNumberOfElements()<<" elements "<<endl;
00087 
00088       unsigned long long int start = 0;
00089       unsigned long long int stop = 0;
00090       int ntrigger = 0;
00091 
00092       //Get Start and Stop acquisition
00093       std::string start_str = inCol->getParameters().getStringVal("Start_Acquisition");
00094       std::string stop_str = inCol->getParameters().getStringVal("Stop_Acquisition");
00095 
00096       if(start_str != "")
00097         start = std::stoll(start_str);
00098       if(stop_str != "")
00099         stop = std::stoll(stop_str);
00100 
00101       for ( int Counter = 0; Counter < inCol->getNumberOfElements(); Counter++ ) 
00102         {
00103           BIFBlock *bif = dynamic_cast<BIFBlock*>(inCol->getElementAt(Counter));
00104 
00105           int _source = bif->getTriggerSource();
00106           int _BXID = bif->getBXID();
00107           float _Time = bif->getTime();
00108 
00109           //write vector to ROOT file
00110           _bifFill.source[ntrigger] = _source;
00111           _bifFill.BXID[ntrigger] = _BXID;
00112           _bifFill.Time[ntrigger] = _Time;
00113 
00114           ntrigger++;
00115         }
00116 
00117       _bifFill.StartAcq = start;
00118       _bifFill.StopAcq = stop;
00119       _bifFill.nTrigger = ntrigger;
00120 
00121     }/*try*/
00122     
00123     catch ( DataNotAvailableException err ) 
00124       {
00125         resetBifFill();
00126         streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<  "BifWriteEngine WARNING: Collection "<< _bifColName
00127                              << " not available in event "<< evt->getEventNumber() << endl;
00128       }/*catch*/
00129     
00130   }/*fillVariables*/
00131 
00132   /*********************************************************************************/
00133   /*                                                                               */
00134   /*                                                                               */
00135   /*                                                                               */
00136   /*********************************************************************************/
00137 
00138   void BifWriteEngine::resetBifFill() 
00139   {
00140     _bifFill.StartAcq = 0;
00141     _bifFill.StopAcq = 0;
00142     _bifFill.nTrigger = 0;
00143 
00144     for (unsigned int i = 0; i<MAXTRIGGERS; i++)
00145       {
00146         _bifFill.source[i] = 0;
00147         _bifFill.BXID[i] = 0;
00148         _bifFill.Time[i] = 0;
00149       }
00150   }
00151 
00152 }//namespace
